rows.label: tlk47500163_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh! What good timing! There's
something I need doing. Want to help?

rows.label: tlk47500163_04_msg0002
rows.name:
I want you to fetch some flowers for
my wife's grave.

rows.label: tlk47500163_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Course, they're not flowers you can get
round here. They're a special blue
flower only found on Lonaria Island.

rows.label: tlk47500163_04_msg0004
rows.name:
She used to love those flowers best of
all, but I'm too long in the tooth to
go fetching them.

rows.label: tlk47500163_04_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm sure strapping youths such as you,
shouldn't have any problem though.
